description: One of the PSUs has failed, the value of ecsPSUStatus is
returned to indicate which PSU has failed.
The status of the PSUs in the LinkBuilder ECS.
variables.name: LBHUB-ECS-MIB::ecsPSUStatus

description: A LinkBuilder ECS Fan has failed, requiring
immediate attenstion.
The LinkBuilder ECS configuartion has changed. Either a card has
been added or removed, a port disabled or enabled from the front
panel or a AUI port has been selected/deselected.
A port has partitioned/unpartitioned or has changed link state. The
values of ecsInfoSlotIndex and ecsInfoPortIndex are returned to
indicate the slot and port, the ecsPortErrorState is returned to
indicate the type or port error.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD LBHUB-ECS-MIB::portTrap LBHUB-ECS-MIB::ecsInfoSlotIndex i 9999 LBHUB-ECS-MIB::ecsInfoPortIndex i 9999 LBHUB-ECS-MIB::ecsPortErrorState i 1

description: The repeater slot index
variables.name: LBHUB-ECS-MIB::ecsInfoSlotIndex

description: The repeater port index
variables.name: LBHUB-ECS-MIB::ecsInfoPortIndex

description: The error status of the specified port. Under normal conditions this takes
the value 'normal' specifying that no error condition has been detected.
variables.name: LBHUB-ECS-MIB::ecsPortErrorState

description: The LinkBuilder ECS Resilient Link system has operated.
The resilient link is returned to determine the action taken.

event.Summary: LinkBuilder ECS resilient link system is operational

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD LBHUB-ECS-MIB::resilientLinkTrap LBHUB-ECS-MIB::ecsRLMainLinkSlot i 9999 LBHUB-ECS-MIB::ecsRLMainLinkPort i 9999 LBHUB-ECS-MIB::ecsRLStandbySlot i 9999 LBHUB-ECS-MIB::ecsRLStandbyPort i 9999 LBHUB-ECS-MIB::ecsRLActiveLink i 1 LBHUB-ECS-MIB::ecsResLinkState i 1

description: The Slot Number for the main link of this resilient link.
variables.name: LBHUB-ECS-MIB::ecsRLMainLinkSlot

description: The Port Number for the main link of this resilient link.
variables.name: LBHUB-ECS-MIB::ecsRLMainLinkPort

description: The Slot Number for the standby link of this resilient link.
variables.name: LBHUB-ECS-MIB::ecsRLStandbySlot

description: The Port Number for the standby link of this resilient link.
variables.name: LBHUB-ECS-MIB::ecsRLStandbyPort

description: The resilient link currently in use for traffic transmission. For
a read the attribute indicates which link is active.
A new link will always be configured with the main
link being the active link. If the link status cannot be determined
the value unknown(1) is returned.
variables.name: LBHUB-ECS-MIB::ecsRLActiveLink

description: A Guage threshold has been exceeded. The slot and port number
are given by the vakues if ecsInfoSlotIndex and ecsInfoPortIndex
and the guage that has been exceeded is given by the value of
ecsPortErrorState.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD LBHUB-ECS-MIB::rateTrap LBHUB-ECS-MIB::ecsInfoSlotIndex i 9999 LBHUB-ECS-MIB::ecsInfoPortIndex i 9999 LBHUB-ECS-MIB::ecsPortErrorState i 1

description: The repeater slot index
variables.name: LBHUB-ECS-MIB::ecsInfoSlotIndex

description: The repeater port index
variables.name: LBHUB-ECS-MIB::ecsInfoPortIndex

description: The error status of the specified port. Under normal conditions this takes
the value 'normal' specifying that no error condition has been detected.
variables.name: LBHUB-ECS-MIB::ecsPortErrorState

description: The Station Locate databse has either changed or has become
full. The particular condition is shown by the value of
ecsRLCSLDataBAseStatus returned.
There has been access to the security menus from the front panel
menus. The value of ecsAgentSecureManagementStatus reports
whether the trap was generated beacuse the security menus were
entered, the secure password was violated or the security
configuration has been changed.

event.Summary: Security menus are accessed from the front panel

description: Indicates whether the remote management of the security features
of the ECS are enabled or not.
variables.name: LBHUB-ECS-MIB::ecsAgentSecureManagementStatus

description: A secure port has either detected an authorised port and taken
appropriate action or has learnt an authorised station on the
slot and port indicated.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD LBHUB-ECS-MIB::secureRLCportTrap LBHUB-ECS-MIB::ecsSecRLCSlotIndex i 9999 LBHUB-ECS-MIB::ecsSecRLCPortIndex i 9999 LBHUB-ECS-MIB::ecsSecRLCPortState i 1 LBHUB-ECS-MIB::ecsSecRLCMACAddress s EXAMPLE

description: The secure repeater line card slot index
variables.name: LBHUB-ECS-MIB::ecsSecRLCSlotIndex

description: The secure repeater line card port index
variables.name: LBHUB-ECS-MIB::ecsSecRLCPortIndex

description: Attribute to determine whether the port can be normally enabled.
variables.name: LBHUB-ECS-MIB::ecsSecRLCPortState

description: The MAC address in use by the secure repeater line card.
variables.name: LBHUB-ECS-MIB::ecsSecRLCMACAddress
